channel.title: EasyRSC How to add x amount of fish to a new created account?
channel.description:
Were would i add like sword fish to a new account created bank? I totally dont understand that bit on how to add.
Thanks for looking.

item.title: EasyRSC How to add x amount of fish to a new created account?
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

Miles`:

What you can do is make a level 3 named anything, spawn swordfish in their bank using the control panel. Go to the players folder, go to their template, copy everything in it. Go to the file called ‘template’ and delete everything and paste everything you just copied. Make sure the rank=0 and make sure the pass=NULL. This will copy everything you add into their banks, stats you put on that account, inventory, and location.

Ah you legend miles

Read full topic
item.source: EasyRSC How to add x amount of fish to a new created account?

What you can do is make a level 3 named anything, spawn swordfish in their bank using the control panel. Go to the players folder, go to their template, copy everything in it. Go to the file called ‘template’ and delete everything and paste everything you just copied. Make sure the rank=0 and make sure the pass=NULL. This will copy everything you add into their banks, stats you put on that account, inventory, and location.
